channel.title: Comby Blog
channel.description: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest Comby news and events.

item.title: Whatever You Want syntax for rewriting code
item.description:
We have color themes for our IDEs. We should have syntax themes for our tools.

Search and Replace commands could look like this.

swap($1, $2) ‚Üí swap($2, $1)

swap(Œ±, Œ≤) ‚Üí swap(Œ≤, Œ±)

swap(üêµ, üçå) ‚Üí swap(üçå, üêµ)

With Whatever You Want (WYW) syntax, it‚Äôs ...

item.title: Comby website gets a refresh
